properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 29 at 3:39PM EST until March 2 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
waves 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Sunday to 1 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM SUNDAY TO 1 AM EST MONDAY
